participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

PTSDCH_01.LongName: 1) Being in a big earthquake that badly damaged the building you were in.

PTSDCH_02.LongName: 2) Being in another kind of disaster, like a fire, tornado, flood or hurricane.

PTSDCH_03.LongName: 3) Being in a bad accident, like a very serious car accident.

PTSDCH_04.LongName: 4) Being in a place where a war was going on around you.

PTSDCH_05.LongName: 5) Being hit, punched, or kicked very hard at home. (DO NOT INCLUDE ordinary fights between brothers & sisters).

PTSDCH_06.LongName: 6 )Seeing a family member being hit, punched, or kicked very hard at home. (DO NOT INCLUDE ordinary fights between brothers & sisters).

PTSDCH_07.LongName: 7) Being beaten up, shot at or threatened to be hurt badly in your town.

PTSDCH_08.LongName: 8) Seeing someone in your town being beaten up, shot at or killed.

PTSDCH_9.LongName: 9) Seeing a dead body in your town (do not include funerals).

PTSDCH_10.LongName: 10) Having an adult or someone much older touch your private sexual body parts when you did not want them to.

PTSDCH_11.LongName: 11) Hearing about the violent death or serious injury of a loved one.

PTSDCH_12.LongName: 12) Having painful and scary medical treatment in a hospital when you were very sick or badly injured.

PTSDCH_13.LongName: 13) OTHER than the situations described above, has ANYTHING ELSE ever happened to you that was REALLY SCARY, DANGEROUS, OR VIOLENT?

PTSDCH_14.LongName: Did you answer "YES" to ANY  of the above questions?

PTSDCH_15.LongName: If you answered "YES" to ONE OR MORE , please pick the number of the thing that BOTHERS YOU THE MOST NOW:

Levels.6: 6-seeing a family member being hit, punched or kicked very hard at home
Levels.7: 7-being beaten up, shot at or threatened to be hurt badly
Levels.8: 8-seeing someone beaten up, shot or killed
Levels.10: 10-being touched on your private sexual body parts by an adult or someone much older
Levels.11: 11-hearing about the violent death or serious injury of loved one
Levels.13: 13-other really scary, dangerous, or violent situation

PTSDCH_16.LongName: About how long ago did this bad thing happen to you?

PTSDCH_17.LongName: Were you scared that you would die?

PTSDCH_18.LongName: Were you scared that you would be hurt badly?

PTSDCH_20.LongName: Were you scared that someone else would die?

PTSDCH_21.LongName: Were you scared that someone else would be hurt badly?

PTSDCH_24.LongName: Did you feel very scared, like this was one of your most scary experiences ever?

PTSDCH_25.LongName: Did you feel that you could not stop what was happening or that you needed someone to help?

PTSDCH_26.LongName: Did you feel that what you saw was disgusting or gross?

PTSDCH_27.LongName: Did you run around or act like you were very upset?

PTSDCH_29.LongName: Did you feel like what was happening did not seem real in some way, like it was going on in a movie instead of real life?

PTSDCH_30.LongName: I watch out for danger or things that I am afraid of.

PTSDCH_31.LongName: When something reminds me of what happened, I get very upset, afraid, or sad.

PTSDCH_32.LongName: I have upsetting thoughts, pictures, or sounds of what happened come into my mind when I do not want them to.

PTSDCH_33.LongName: I feel grouchy, angry or mad.

PTSDCH_34.LongName: I have dreams about what happened or other bad dreams.

PTSDCH_35.LongName: I feel like I am back at the time when the bad thing happened, living through it again.

PTSDCH_36.LongName: I feel like staying by myself and not being with my friends.

PTSDCH_37.LongName: I feel alone inside and not close to other people.

PTSDCH_38.LongName: I try not to talk about, think about, or have feelings about what happened.

PTSDCH_39.LongName: I have trouble feeling happiness or love.

PTSDCH_40.LongName: I have trouble feeling sadness or anger.

PTSDCH_41.LongName: I feel jumpy or startle easily, like when I hear a loud noise or when something surprises me.

PTSDCH_42.LongName: I have trouble going to sleep or I wake up often during the night.

PTSDCH_43.LongName: I think that some part of what happened to me is my fault.

PTSDCH_44.LongName: I have trouble remembering important parts of what happened.

PTSDCH_45.LongName: I have trouble concentrating or paying attention.

PTSDCH_46.LongName: I try to stay away from people, places, or things that make me remember what happened.

PTSDCH_47.LongName: When something remind me of what happened, I have strong feelings in my body, like my heart beats fast, my head aches, or my stomach aches.

PTSDCH_48.LongName: I think that I will not live a long life.

PTSDCH_49.LongName: I am afraid that the bad thing will happen again.

PTSDCH_51.Description: At least on “Yes” response to questions 1-13. | Calculation = iif ([PTSDCH_01]+[PTSDCH_02]+[PTSDCH_03]+[PTSDCH_04]+[PTSDCH_05]+[PTSDCH_06]+[PTSDCH_07]+[PTSDCH_08]+[PTSDCH_9]+[PTSDCH_10]+[PTSDCH_11]+[PTSDCH_12]+[PTSDCH_13]>=1, 'YES','NO')

PTSDCH_52.Description: At least 1 “Yes” response to questions 17-23. | Calculation = iif ([PTSDCH_17]+[PTSDCH_18]+[PTSDCH_19]+[PTSDCH_20]+[PTSDCH_21]+[PTSDCH_22]+[PTSDCH_23]>=1, 'YES','NO')

PTSDCH_53.Description: At least 1 “Yes” response to questions 24-29. | Calculation = iif ([PTSDCH_24]+[PTSDCH_25]+[PTSDCH_26]+[PTSDCH_27]+[PTSDCH_28]+[PTSDCH_29]>=1, 'YES','NO')

PTSDCH_55.Description: Sum of scores of questions 1-9, 12, 13, 17-21 and the highest score from either question 10 or 11. | Calculation = [PTSDCH_01]+[PTSDCH_02]+[PTSDCH_03]+[PTSDCH_04]+[PTSDCH_05]+[PTSDCH_06]+[PTSDCH_07]+[PTSDCH_08]+[PTSDCH_9]+[PTSDCH_12]+[PTSDCH_13]+[PTSDCH_17]+[PTSDCH_18]+[PTSDCH_19]+[PTSDCH_20]+[PTSDCH_21]+ iif ([PTSDCH_10]>=[PTSDCH_11], [PTSDCH_10], [PTSDCH_11])

PTSDCH_56.Description: Sum of scores of questions 31, 32, 34, 35, and 47. | Calculation = [PTSDCH_32]+[PTSDCH_34]+[PTSDCH_35]+[PTSDCH_31]+[PTSDCH_47]

PTSDCH_57.Description:
Sum of scores of questions 38, 46, 44, 36, 37, 48 and highest score from either question 39 or 40. | Calculation = [PTSDCH_38]+[PTSDCH_46]+[PTSDCH_44]+[PTSDCH_36]+[PTSDCH_37]+[PTSDCH_48]+
iif ([PTSDCH_39]>=[PTSDCH_40], [PTSDCH_39], [PTSDCH_40])

PTSDCH_58.Description: Sum of scores of questions 42, 45, 30, 41, 33. | Calculation = [PTSDCH_42]+[PTSDCH_45]+[PTSDCH_30]+[PTSDCH_41]+[PTSDCH_33]
